headline: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro sets campaign cash record to start election year
author: Associated Press
sentences: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — The Democratic Party’s endorsed candidate for governor of Pennsylvania, state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, headed into 2021 with $13.4 million in his campaign account, a state record for a candidate heading into an election year.
Shapiro, whose campaign report was posted online by the state after Monday night’s reporting deadline, is not expected to face opposition in the primary and has unified the party, gett ...
